project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates a random password with specified complexity and length.

task.name: Implement password generation logic that includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
Allow the user to configure the password length through input.
Write tests for the password generation function to ensure it meets the specified complexity requirements.
Execute tests on the password generation function to verify its correctness and security.
